headline: XLE Surged 21.6% This Year as Oil Majors Navigate $64 Crude Reality
summary: The Energy Select Sector SPDR Fund (NYSEARCA:XLE) has surged 21.6% year to date as markets pivot from energy transition rhetoric toward energy security concerns. This performance reflects investor confidence that the fund’s $33 billion portfolio of oil majors can navigate volatile crude prices and deliver returns even when commodity markets remain unpredictable. The Oil Price ... XLE Surged 21.6% This Year as Oil Majors Navigate $64 Crude Reality

headline: HELLENiQ ENERGY and Chevron Sign Offshore Concession Agreements for Hydrocarbon Exploration and Production with the Hellenic Republic
summary: ATHENS, Greece, February 16, 2026--HELLENiQ ENERGY, in collaboration with Chevron, signed today the Lease Agreements with the Hellenic Republic for the exploration of four offshore blocks located south of Crete and the Peloponnese, marking a significant milestone for Greece’s upstream development.

raw.headline: HELLENiQ ENERGY and Chevron Sign Offshore Concession Agreements for Hydrocarbon Exploration and Production with the Hellenic Republic
raw.summary: ATHENS, Greece, February 16, 2026--HELLENiQ ENERGY, in collaboration with Chevron, signed today the Lease Agreements with the Hellenic Republic for the exploration of four offshore blocks located south of Crete and the Peloponnese, marking a significant milestone for Greece’s upstream development.

headline: California gas prices surge 40 cents in just 2 weeks as impact of refinery closures weighs
summary: Refinery closures including Valero's Benicia facility leave California with six operating refineries, driving gas prices to the highest in nation at $4.58 per gallon.

raw.headline: California gas prices surge 40 cents in just 2 weeks as impact of refinery closures weighs
raw.summary: Refinery closures including Valero's Benicia facility leave California with six operating refineries, driving gas prices to the highest in nation at $4.58 per gallon.

headline: Chevron-Led Joint Venture Signs Major Gas Exploration Deal Offshore Greece
summary: A Chevron-led consortium, including Helleniq Energy, signed lease agreements with Greece for oil and gas exploration in four offshore blocks as the country aims to become a major gas supplier in the Mediterranean.

raw.headline: Chevron-Led Joint Venture Signs Major Gas Exploration Deal Offshore Greece
raw.summary: A Chevron-led consortium, including Helleniq Energy, signed lease agreements with Greece for oil and gas exploration in four offshore blocks as the country aims to become a major gas supplier in the Mediterranean.

headline: Chevron Awarded Four Offshore Leases for Greece Exploration Blocks
summary: HOUSTON, February 16, 2026--Chevron Corporation (NYSE: CVX), via its four Dutch subsidiaries, together with HELLENiQ ENERGY has today signed Lease Agreements with the Hellenic Republic which will enable exploration of four blocks offshore Greece.

raw.headline: Chevron Awarded Four Offshore Leases for Greece Exploration Blocks
raw.summary: HOUSTON, February 16, 2026--Chevron Corporation (NYSE: CVX), via its four Dutch subsidiaries, together with HELLENiQ ENERGY has today signed Lease Agreements with the Hellenic Republic which will enable exploration of four blocks offshore Greece.

headline: US grants two licences to global companies in Venezuela oil sector
summary: The OFAC issued general licences to Chevron, bp, Eni, Shell and Repsol for operating oil and gas projects in Venezuela.

raw.headline: US grants two licences to global companies in Venezuela oil sector
raw.summary: The OFAC issued general licences to Chevron, bp, Eni, Shell and Repsol for operating oil and gas projects in Venezuela.
